name: my-blog
description: Personal blog with Astro frontend and Strapi backend

scripts.dev:back: echo 'Backend not configured yet (Strapi pending)' && exit 0
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd front && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Project setup complete!'
scripts.lint: cd front && npm run astro check
scripts.type-check: cd front && npm run astro check
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run setup to install all dependencies'
